channel.title: Comments on: IA and ONE concert screening at Tsukuba Conference next month!
channel.description: Everything about virtual voices, just one click away!

item.title: By: юра к
item.dc:creator: юра к
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/ia-and-one-concert-screening-at-tsukuba-conference-next-month/#comment-78">anonymous</a>.
I searched in internet. They said, it will be 3-day conference, and the 3rd day will be open for public.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to anonymous.

I searched in internet. They said, it will be 3-day conference, and the 3rd day will be open for public.

item.title: By: anonymous
item.dc:creator: anonymous
item.description: If it's a 3 day conference, how come it says the "fourth" day is open to the public? Where does this fourth day come from?
item.content:encoded: If it’s a 3 day conference, how come it says the “fourth” day is open to the public? Where does this fourth day come from?
